alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:22PM CDT until July 29 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE...SOUTHERN WINNESHIEK AND SOUTHEASTERN CHICKASAW COUNTIES... At 722 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waucoma, or 13 miles west of West Union, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Fort Atkinson, Calmar, Spillville, Ossian and Decorah. People attending Nordic Fest should seek safe shelter immediately! THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
